code: import axios from"axios";export const CONTEXT_PATH=window.location.origin;const axiosInstance=axios.create({baseURL:CONTEXT_PATH,timeout:10000,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Accept":"application/json","Access-Control-Allow-Origin":"http://localhost:3000",'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials':"true"},withCredentials:true});export default axiosInstance;
